notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage and destruction in the Aliabad area of Hunza Nagar District, Pakistan and located roughly 350 km east of the 26 October 2015 earthquake epicenter. Using a Pléiades satellite image acquired 31 October 2015 and a WorldView-2 image acquired 12 August 2015, UNITAR-UNOSAT identified 55 potentially damaged structures. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
